data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Karelia to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Karelia, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Karelia to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Karelia, Russia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Karelia, Russia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Uzbeki people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Uzbeki people.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Karelia against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 9,256 believers in Karelia and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Karelia hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
